Name: Tailwhip
Description: Deal 1 damage to up two enemies.

Name: Strike
Description: Deal 1 damage. If you have played another action with your partner's icon today, deal 3 damage instead.

Name: Lash Out
Description:
Deal 3 damage divided as you choose between any number of enemies.
Discard this card.

Name: Constrict
Description: Deal 2 damage. If that damage is dealt to an enemy, also blank it until tomorrow.

Name: Consume
Description:
Draw all the cards in your partner's hand.
You and your partner forage.

Name: Encircle
Description: Deal 6 damage divided as you choose between up to two enemies.
